extendedInfo.description: This is the must played bubble shooter. Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them dissapear and score points. The more bubbles you shoot at once the more points you get.

reviews.title: Worst game ever
reviews.comment: This games ai is all over the place, its blocky. The bubbles dont go where u put them they get stuck all the time and there is no real achievement to be made. Dont even click this one go for bubble shoot imstead. Now thats a sense of achievement in world format
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DROID maxx
reviews.comment: Love it. Addictive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Level 65...can\'t win. Uninstalling
reviews.comment: Stuck on level 65. Uninstalling. Will not recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: I don\'t like the hesitation I get before shooting the ball sometimes. Fix that and I\'ll reinstall the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spam!,
reviews.comment: This game installed all kinds of spam on my tablet. Do not download!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Often would freeze and lose levels already beat. Level 993 is impossible! Shot placement often sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible and racey adds
reviews.comment: Great game, but the adds were too inappropriate, lude, and horrid. I would buy an add free version of the game though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best games ever
reviews.comment: I love this fun game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I hate it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it but...
reviews.comment: I would give it a higher rating if it didn\'t freeze every time i open it

reviews.title: STUPID
reviews.comment: The game keeps repeating its levels it sucks don\'t get this game as I said it suckd
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s worth a go
reviews.comment: Not the most difficult but entertaining enough
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: There\'s alot of these games that won\'t install and some that won\'t pull up like Bubble Paradise, Fire Bubble, Cranky Cat\'s, please fix so I can play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay.
reviews.comment: I enjoy playing this game. Just wish it had a better tumult accuracy.. but other than that, it is a pretty addictive game. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A
reviews.comment: I love the game. It is really fun. :) But there are to many adds for my phone.( it may be your phone to. Not just mine). On the first time you shoot on any level it gives you the color all the way on top. That is all I have to say bad about it. Like I said I love the game it is fun. I will keep playing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: It\'s totally addicting! It can freeze sometimes, but overall it\'s my go to game to unwind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bubble Shoot
reviews.comment: Deserves 5 stars.  However I spent about 20 hours on 88 and came close but game would not let me win when down to last bubble game throws an odd collored bubble. Unfair at times and I do not like  that at all .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: So far so good performance wise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shoot bubble
reviews.comment: Love this game !  Very addictive.
reviews.author: A Google User
